column5: Well I got into some fish yesterday why'll at green ribbon trail landed 4 brown bullheads 1 golden shiner and 1-2 on carp I was targeting carp lost one it gave a good fight but my line was wrapped around my tip and didnt notice it, gave one good head shake after fighting the dang thing for 3 minutes and there goes the hook popped right out of the mouth, about an hour later saw my float just disappear why'll going a different direction picked up the rod and gave a nice hook set, my pole bends over and the fight is on, fought the fish for a good 5 mins alot of bulldogging not much running gave a few good runs and finally netted it.      only flower on the tree behind me so I decided to take a pic
Sweet carp! I need to get out fishing! Been super busy lately!
yes you do need to get out fishing soon its slow for carp right now next weekend not this upcoming one, it should be on fire ill let you know there are a few surfacing but thats it.
Nice job buddy, haven't caught myself a carp this season yet. Soon I hope, there unbelievable fighters!  Thanks for sharing, MTBF
Never caught a carp before but that is a nice one Congrats carpman3000 Leechman
Nice fish man. Were you fishing at desjardins park for one of the carpers get togethers earlier this spring. Your face looks familiar lol
